reviewtext: If I'm listening to serious music, like a classical symphony, I will of course put on my expensive phones, but if I'm just listening to You Tube or selecting cuts from Amazon, these work just fine.  I probably use them 90% of the time because they have some other important attributes to think about.  They fit into a shallow drawer, unlike a lot of full size phones.  You can stuff them into a coat pocket.  I have found them to be very sturdy.  And I find them very comfortable because of their lightness and because the earpiece is small.  Also, I have a big head and have trouble with some good headphones that feel like they are strangling my ears.  These have a big adjustment range.  These are a great buy.
summary: A good budget headphone with specific uses
